extension.name: Latest Blog posts
extension.author: HUBzero
extension.copyright: Copyright 2005-2011 Purdue University. All rights reserved.
extension.description: This module shows the latest blog posts in the site blog as well as group blogs.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module class suffix
field.description: A CSS class to be applied to the module container, this allows individual module styling

field.name: limit
field.label: # to display
field.description: The number of items to display.

field.name: pulloutlimit
field.label: Length of Pullout
field.description: Number of characters to display in post.

field.name: details
field.label: Post Details
field.description: Display details such as author and published time?

field.name: preview
field.label: Post Preview
field.description: Display a preview or teaser of the post's text?

field.name: charlimit
field.label: Length of Post Preview
field.description: Number of characters to display in post.

field.name: blog
field.label: Included Discussions From
field.description: Where the discussions are pulled from.

field.name: cache
field.label: Enable Cache
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is re-cached
